00051 class DZ_EXPORT DzPlugin : public QObject {
00052     Q_OBJECT

00061             const QString &desription = QString::null, unsigned short major = 0,

00114 
00115 class DzPluginHelper {
00116 protected:
00117     DzPluginHelper( DzPlugin *plugin ) : m_plugin( plugin ) { }
00118 
00119     void    setDescription( const QString &str ) { m_plugin->setDescription( str ); }
00120     void    setAuthor( const QString &str ) { m_plugin->setAuthor( str ); }
00121     void    setVersion( unsigned short major, unsigned short minor, unsigned short rev, unsigned short build ) { m_plugin->setVersion( major, minor, rev, build ); }
00122     void    setActivationPolicy( const DzGuid &guid, DzActivationPolicy *policy ) { m_plugin->setActivationPolicy( guid, policy ); }
00123     void    addRegistrationPrefix( const QString &prefix, const QString &version, const QString &description ) { m_plugin->addRegistrationPrefix( prefix, version, description ); }
00124 
00125 private:
00126     DzPlugin    *m_plugin;
00127 };

00133 #ifndef Q_MOC_RUN
00134 
00135 // Macros for defining plug-in exports
00136 // This installs the DllMain function that Windows requires for plug-ins.
00137 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN32
00138 
00139 #include <windows.h>
00140 
00141 #define DZ_PLUGIN_DEFINITION( pluginName ) \
00142 BOOL WINAPI DllMain( HINSTANCE hinstDLL, ULONG fdwReason, LPVOID lpvReserved )  \
00143 {   \
00144     switch( fdwReason ) {       \
00145     case DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH:    \
00146         break;                  \
00147     case DLL_THREAD_ATTACH:     \
00148         break;                  \
00149     case DLL_THREAD_DETACH:     \
00150         break;                  \
00151     case DLL_PROCESS_DETACH:    \
00152         break;                  \
00153     }                           \
00154     return TRUE;                \
00155 } \
00156  \
00157 static DzPlugin s_pluginDef( pluginName ); \
00158 __declspec(dllexport) DzVersion getSDKVersion() { return DZ_SDK_VERSION; } \
00159 __declspec(dllexport) DzPlugin *getPluginDefinition() { return &s_pluginDef; }
00160 
00161 #define DZ_CUSTOM_PLUGIN_DEFINITION( pluginClass ) \
00162 BOOL WINAPI DllMain( HINSTANCE hinstDLL, ULONG fdwReason, LPVOID lpvReserved )  \
00163 {   \
00164     switch( fdwReason ) {       \
00165     case DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH:    \
00166         break;                  \
00167     case DLL_THREAD_ATTACH:     \
00168         break;                  \
00169     case DLL_THREAD_DETACH:     \
00170         break;                  \
00171     case DLL_PROCESS_DETACH:    \
00172         break;                  \
00173     }                           \
00174     return TRUE;                \
00175 } \
00176  \
00177 static pluginClass s_pluginDef; \
00178 __declspec(dllexport) DzVersion getSDKVersion() { return DZ_SDK_VERSION; } \
00179 __declspec(dllexport) DzPlugin *getPluginDefinition() { return &s_pluginDef; }
00180 #else
00181 
00182 #define DZ_PLUGIN_DEFINITION( pluginName ) \
00183 static DzPlugin s_pluginDef( pluginName ); \
00184 extern "C" DzVersion getSDKVersion() { return DZ_SDK_VERSION; } \
00185 extern "C" DzPlugin *getPluginDefinition() { return &s_pluginDef; }
00186 
00187 #define DZ_CUSTOM_PLUGIN_DEFINITION( pluginClass ) \
00188 static pluginClass s_pluginDef; \
00189 extern "C" DzVersion getSDKVersion() { return DZ_SDK_VERSION; } \
00190 extern "C" DzPlugin *getPluginDefinition() { return &s_pluginDef; }
00191 #endif

00219 /*Standard exported plug-in class.*/
00220 #define DZ_PLUGIN_CLASS_GUID_OWNED( typeName, guid, scriptOwnership ) \
00221 Q_DECLARE_METATYPE(typeName*) \
00222 static DzGuid   typeName##GUID( DzGuid::fromString( #guid ) ); \
00223 class typeName##Factory : public DzTClassFactory<typeName> { \
00224 public: \
00225     typeName##Factory() : DzTClassFactory<typeName>( typeName##GUID , scriptOwnership ) { \
00226         s_pluginDef.addClassFactory( this ); \
00227     } \
00228 }; \
00229  \
00230 static typeName##Factory typeName##ClassFactory;
00231 
00232 /*Used for classes that wish to take arguments in their script constructors*/
00233 #define DZ_PLUGIN_CUSTOM_CLASS_GUID_OWNED( typeName, guid, scriptOwnership ) \
00234 Q_DECLARE_METATYPE(typeName*) \
00235 static DzGuid   typeName##GUID( DzGuid::fromString( #guid ) ); \
00236 class typeName##Factory : public DzTClassFactory<typeName> { \
00237 public: \
00238     typeName##Factory() : DzTClassFactory<typeName>( typeName##GUID , scriptOwnership ) { \
00239         s_pluginDef.addClassFactory( this ); \
00240     } \
00241     virtual QObject*    createInstance( const QVariantList &args ) const;\
00242     virtual QObject*    createInstance() const;\
00243 }; \
00244  \
00245 static typeName##Factory typeName##ClassFactory;

00255 /*Used to declare classes that can be used in script, but not created in script.*/
00256 #define DZ_PLUGIN_ABSTRACT_CLASS_GUID( typeName, guid ) \
00257 Q_DECLARE_METATYPE(typeName*) \
00258 static DzGuid   typeName##GUID( DzGuid::fromString( #guid ) ); \
00259 class typeName##Factory : public DzTCustomClassFactory<typeName> { \
00260 public: \
00261     typeName##Factory() : DzTCustomClassFactory<typeName>( typeName##GUID ) { \
00262         s_pluginDef.addClassFactory( this ); \
00263     } \
00264     virtual QObject*    createInstance( const QVariantList &args ) const {return NULL;}\
00265     virtual QObject*    createInstance() const { return NULL; }\
00266 }; \
00267  \
00268 static typeName##Factory typeName##ClassFactory;
00269

00274 public: \

00276         s_pluginDef.addClassFactory( this ); \
00277     } \
00278     virtual QObject*    createInstance( const QVariantList &args ) const;\
00279     virtual QObject*    createInstance() const;\
00280 }; \
00281  \
00282 static typeName##Factory typeName##ClassFactory;

00316 struct ioClass##AssetExtraObjectIORegistar { \
00317 public: \
00318     ioClass##AssetExtraObjectIORegistar() \
00319         { s_pluginDef.addIOClassRegistration( QString(prefix) + QString(tag), &ioClass::staticMetaObject, NULL); } \

00328 }; \
